title: Demo Parasite Axes
description: In this lab, you will learn how to create a parasite axes using the `mpl_toolkits.axes_grid1.parasite_axes.HostAxes` and `mpl_toolkits.axes_grid1.parasite_axes.ParasiteAxes` modules in Matplotlib. The parasite axes shares the x-scale with a host axes, but shows a different scale in y direction.
